title: Padua
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Padua, from a wide variety of genres like Adult Contemporary, Italian, Love Songs, Pop and Romantic.  Enjoy stations such as Love FM - On The Road, Love FM - Boutique, Radio Freedom, Wellness Radio, Radio Bue and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.
